parameters.title: Mode
enum_titles: P: Hall effect current sensor (2.5V±0.625V), single ended

voltage measurement in differential mode from -2 to 2 V

parameters.title: Number of measurements
parameters.description: Total sampling time of channel is (Sampling time * Number of measurements). Channels are polled sequentially.
